p: The use of organic NPs (ONP) over INPs is well studied in biomedical field due to various safety issues [ 95]. ONP possess many advantages over other nanoparticles platforms, such as self-assembly in physiologically mild conditions, and chemical diversity for accommodating a variety of modalities, sizes, surface functionalization, shapes, and compositions [ 75]. Multiple forms of ONP are being exploited in nanomedicine but only few are presently being evaluated for their virucidal activity. These include lipid based NP, polymeric NP, and dendrimers.
